title: Community of Inquiry-Based Project Design to Improve Engagement in Online Mathematics Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and proficiency in online learning tools
context.additional_context: Adult working professionals perform math projects to solve real-life problems. Requires strengthening collaborative and self-directed learning in digitally supported environments

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% participation in online discussions utilizing the three dimensions of the CoI framework (teaching presence, cognitive presence, social presence).
Learners apply Self-Regulated Learning (SRL) strategies to plan and execute at least two voluntary learning activities per week during the project period.
Learners complete an average of three or more feedback exchanges during collaborative problem-solving with peer learners in PBL projects.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
